title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Business Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will analyze business needs, manage requirements, and collaborate with stakeholders to drive improvements in processes and systems. Your expertise in business analysis and insurance solutions will be essential in shaping the success of our projects.

Responsibilities



Manage stakeholder expectations and facilitate effective communication
Document and maintain business analysis artifacts
Plan and execute business analysis activities
Conduct in-depth requirements analysis and change management
Provide insights and recommendations for business process improvements
Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless project execution
Analyze the current business analysis work and status, identifying areas for improvement
Participate in occasional late meetings when required



Requirements



3+ years of experience in business analysis
Strong stakeholder management skills
Proficiency in BA artifacts documentation
Expertise in business analysis activities planning
Deep understanding of requirements analysis and change management
Hands-on experience with EIS ClaimCore v12
Excellent communication and analytical skills
English level B2+



Nice to have



Experience with EIS Solutions
Knowledge of insurance domain processes
Strong background in analyzing and improving business analysis workflows
Ability to handle complex business scenarios with innovative solutions
Experience in facilitating late meetings when necessary



We offer



International projects with top brands
Work with global teams of highly skilled, diverse peers
Healthcare benefits
Employee financial programs
Paid time off and sick leave
Upskilling, reskilling and certification courses
Unlimited access to the LinkedIn Learning library and 22,000+ courses
Global career opportunities
Volunteer and community involvement opportunities
EPAM Employee Groups
Award-winning culture recognized by Glassdoor, Newsweek and LinkedIn
